channel.title: Talks on Ivan Klimchuk
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Ivan Klimchuk

item.title: The MODX Technical Vision
item.description: It is the second speech in English and almost without preparation, but extraordinarily emotional and honest.

item.title: Narrow topic meetup: how not to screw up
item.description: I was invited to the non-technical meetup “The art of organizing events” to share my experience in hosting meetups of our local community, built around MODX. The speech was in Russian.

item.title: MODX Teleportation
item.description: Speech in Russian on MODX Meetup Minsk in 2014.

item.title: MODX Cooking Recipes
item.description: My first public speech, in Russian, on local meetup “PHP Saturday” held by Ciklum.
